text: NN wo n't be DT last outbreak . NN NN , waning habitat will drive NN Researchers are n't clear yet about how DT novel NN began infecting NNS , but say PRP seems to have originated in bats , making PRP DT latest in a string of emerging human NN WDT spread from animals . NN and wildlife experts say PRP expect to see a rise in diseases transmitted among animals , plants and humans , and in particular , more frequent outbreaks in humans of diseases WDT come from animals . Such " zoonotic " diseases already make up DT majority of JJ infections in humans . But animals are n't to blame for DT increase in JJ outbreaks , according to Arizona NNP University virologist Arvind Varsani . Humans are . Varsani researches DT emergence of diseases around DT globe and he VBD two major factors likely to impact DT dynamics of NN spread are NN NN and changes in land use due to urbanization or agriculture . Both factors put animals under strain , forcing them to compete for resources in shrinking habitats and making them opportune hosts for zoonotic diseases , which more easily infect stressed animals . Shrinking suitable habitat amid urbanization and DT rapid expansion of agriculture RB cluster animals closer together with humans and domestic animals . DT allows DT viruses to jump from CD host to DT next . “ PRP stress these animals and DT means PRP ’re creating an environment for viruses to succeed , where in most NNS DT viruses MD ’ve been put to check , " he VBD . " And with DT , everyone is in very , very close proximity to each other , so what PRP ’ve got is CD event — and PRP only need CD event to take off — and DT next thing PRP VBP , PRP 's spilling over . ” And sometimes , DT viruses spill over into humans . According to a 2016 report from DT NNP Nations Environment Programme , around 60 percent of all infectious diseases in humans are zoonotic , as well as 75 percent of all emerging infectious diseases . Researchers RB detected an increase in DT rate of JJ , emerging infectious diseases , according to DT report . In DT case of DT novel NN , DT source is believed to be a market in Wuhan , NNP , WDT sold both dead and live animals . Arizona Game and Fish wildlife veterinarian Anne Justice - Allen VBD IN veterinarians and NN experts strongly recommend against having markets IN these , which can be densely packed , difficult to keep clean , and pose a higher risk of viruses jumping from animals into humans . She VBD DT current NN - CD outbreak is an example of how human actions to mix together animals WDT were n't normally together can cause diseases to jump into JJ hosts . " DT more PRP increase DT interaction between NNS and animals , especially wildlife and especially livestock as well , or animals WDT are raised for food , DT more likely PRP are to see DT kind of situation crop up , " she VBD . DT NNP - CD outbreak is an example of DT risk zoonotic diseases pose . Other well - known examples of zoonotic diseases WDT impact humans are West Nile NN , HIV , Ebola , Zika , bird NN , Middle East respiratory syndrome , or MERS , Rift Valley fever , and sudden acute respiratory syndrome , or SARS . On average , CD JJ infectious NN emerges in humans every four months , according to DT UNEP report , but not all are this severe . “ While PRP is very uncommon for diseases in animals to suddenly jump and become so transmissible between NNS as this NN did , DT more PRP do DT sort of thing , mixing animals together ... then DT more likely IN NN is VBG to be able to jump into NNS and become transmissible between NNS , " Justice - Allen VBD . With NN NN effects such as drought , increasing temperatures and wildfires , Justice - Allen VBD animals will be forced to move to JJ areas . DT MD lead to DT same type of crowding and mixing seen in live animal markets and possibly expose animals to JJ diseases . FIGHTING NN : Using robots to speed up testing , ASU hopes to open drive - thru NN testing VBG JJ temperatures are increasing DT habitat ranges of some insects WDT transmit diseases from CD organism to another , such as mosquitoes or ticks . NN is RB lengthening DT season in which these insects can survive in some areas , leading to a boom in their population . In certain areas , these insects , RB known as NN vectors , are now able to survive NN - round where PRP were n't able to before . DT increased range and abundance of vectors MD lead to more widespread NNS of mosquito - and tick - borne diseases such as malaria , West Nile NN , dengue fever , chikungunya , Zika , and Lyme NN , according to Heidi Brown , an ASU researcher who studies vector - borne diseases . Brown is CD of DT researchers who works with DT Arizona Department of NNP Services on a Building Resilience Against NNP Effects plan , which investigates DT impacts of NN NN on human NN , projects future scenarios and suggests solutions to mitigate those effects . Arizona is CD of 16 NN grant recipients creating a BRACE plan as part of DT CDC's NNP - Ready NNPS and Cities Initiative . " PRP have to be prepared for DT known , which is increases in DT stuff WDT PRP 're already seeing , but PRP RB have to be prepared for DT unknown , which is novel introductions , " she VBD . In Arizona , known diseases such as West Nile NNP are likely to become a bigger concern , and MD spread into JJ areas of DT NN outside of Maricopa County , Brown VBD . " Flagstaff does n't typically VB about or worry too much about West Nile NNP , and PRP do n't usually have a lot of NNS up RB , but EX 's evidence WDT suggests IN PRP might need to start making sure IN PRP 're watching for PRP , " she VBD . Arizona is RB worried about other mosquito - born diseases IN chikungunya and dengue fever , which are n't currently part of Arizona 's ecosystem but MD become permanently established in DT future . Factors IN drought can RB cause vectors to cluster around NN sources alongside of animals , leading to further mixing and further possibilities for JJ diseases spread in vectors . Another bridge between humans and animal diseases is domestic animals , according to Bernard Bett , a scientist at International Livestock Research Institute . Around DT NN , Bett VBD agriculture is increasingly encroaching on wild lands , bringing humans and domestic animals closer to wild ones and disturbing DT natural ecosystem . But domestic animals have been bred in such a way IN PRP lack DT genetic diversity needed for NN resilience and can then pass DT infection on to humans . CD example is DT bird NN , which moved from wild birds into domestic poultry before being passed to humans . Demand for milk and meat " driven mainly by fast - growing populations of urban consumers in developing NNS , " is projected to double by 2050 , according to DT UNEP report , meaning IN DT problem is likely to VB worse as agricultural demand expands . Urbanization RB can encroach on wild lands , Varsani VBD , and DT means humans are coming into increased contact with animals — creating another potential avenue for NN transmission . Increased zoonotic NN spread MD RB have devastating effects on animals , especially those already at risk from other NN NN effects . “ PRP have a number of endangered species here in Arizona which are kind of on DT edge when PRP comes to being able to respond to JJ stressors , " Justice - Allen VBD . CD is DT Mount Graham red squirrel , whose habitat was severely damaged by a wildfire in 2017 . While DT population seems to be recovering , Justice - Allen VBD , " another stressor might tip them over DT edge . " Other populations on DT brink include DT California condor , DT black - footed ferret , and Arizona 's indigenous snakes and amphibians such as frogs . Some are already being challenged by NN . Black - footed ferrets feed on prairie dogs , but DT plague , spread by fleas , can wipe out entire colonies of prairie dogs , decimating DT ferrets ' food supply . This NN is n't native to North America , currently has a small incident rate in humans and is curable in most NNS . But NNS of plague MD surge in coming NNS due to NN NN , according to Justice - Allen . " DT dynamics of plague outbreaks is changing , or will VB , " she VBD . " This spring is setting PRP up for a pretty significant plague outbreak . " Arizona 's frogs and other amphibians are battling a fungal NN called chytridiomycosis , which was first seen in Africa and interferes with DT ability of their skin to absorb moisture . These diseases , along with mosquito - and tick - borne diseases , are just a few known diseases WDT Arizona experts are monitoring . But EX 's always DT possibility for unknowns — for JJ diseases to show up unexpectedly — especially in tight living conditions . Varsani RB works to find and VB unknown viruses in remote areas , such as DT polar regions . He has traveled to Antarctica nearly every NN since he first visited about seven NNS ago , and VBD viruses he studies RB MD have been around for a while , but were only discovered recently . CD example is a circovirus WDT has only recently been noticed in penguins and WDT causes lethal feather loss . As seen with DT NN - CD outbreak , NNS for JJ diseases take NN to develop , as do tests to screen for them . Arizona and other NNS have come up with plans to deal with increased outbreaks and have vector - control measures in place , but Brown acknowledged IN PRP can be hard to prepare for JJ emerging diseases . " PRP 's a long process to be able to come up with tests and identify JJ pathogens , especially when PRP 're not DT ones PRP 're used to looking for . ” DT Arizona Game and Fish Department monitors for JJ NN emergences by surveilling animal populations and investigating animal deaths to ensure IN DT cause of death was n't an unknown NN , according to Justice - Allen . Bett VBD NN care officials can take other measures to ensure IN EX is a structured , strong NN system in place with contingency plans for NN outbreaks and centers where patients can be isolated or receive supportive treatment . “ I wonder to what extent DT U.S. anticipated this spread . If PRP have good anticipation , DT ’s a good first line of defense , " Bett VBD . Even with further NN of NN effects on NN , EX can be unpredicted challenges in trying to anticipate and address JJ diseases , VBD Ben Beard , DT deputy director of DT CDC ’s Division of Vector - Borne Diseases in Fort Collins , Colorado . " While long term trends in NN NN can be modeled , specific weather events or disasters such as hurricanes , floods , or fires are very difficult to predict and MD have a big impact on NN outbreaks , " he wrote in an email to DT Republic . To prepare and respond to future outbreaks , he VBD , a strong JJ NN framework WDT prioritizes JJ NN surveillance , NN and local preparedness , and long - term research MD be necessary . In addition to being more conscious of how NNS affect DT environment and existing ecosystems , Varsani VBD identifying and understanding DT viruses present in DT NN currently can help society better prepare to control them . This is no small feat , considering IN viruses are among DT most abundant entities on DT NN . " Viruses are understudied , " he VBD . “ PRP have no idea what DT next entity will be , nobody expected this outbreak to take place and it's now consumed most of DT NN in a very short period . ” Amanda Morris covers all things bioscience , which includes NN care , technology , JJ research and DT environment . text: DT JJ average atmospheric carbon dioxide in 2018 was 407.4 parts per million ( ppm for short ) , with a range of uncertainty of plus or minus 0.1 ppm . Carbon dioxide levels today are higher than at any point in at least DT past 800,000 NNS . In fact , DT last NN DT atmospheric CO amounts were this high was more than 3 million NNS ago , when temperature was 2°–3 °C ( 3.6°–5.4 °F ) higher than during DT pre-industrial era , and NN level was 15 – 25 meters ( 50 – 80 feet ) higher than today . Carbon dioxide concentrations are rising mostly because of DT fossil fuels WDT NNS are burning for NN . Fossil fuels IN coal and oil contain carbon WDT plants pulled out of DT atmosphere through photosynthesis over DT span of JJ millions of NNS ; PRP are returning DT carbon to DT atmosphere in just a few hundred NNS . Squeeze or stretch DT graph in either direction by holding DT Shift key while PRP click and drag . DT bright red line ( source data ) shows monthly average carbon dioxide at NOAA 's Mauna Loa Observatory on Hawai'i in parts per million ( ppm ) : DT number of carbon dioxide molecules per million molecules of dry air . Over DT course of DT NN , values are higher in Northern Hemisphere winter and lower in summer . DT dark red line shows DT annual trend , calculated as a 12 - month rolling average . According to DT NN of DT NNP in 2018 report from NOAA and DT American Meteorological Society , JJ atmospheric carbon dioxide was 407.4 ± 0.1 ppm in 2018 , a JJ record high . DT is an increase of 2.5 ± 0.1 ppm from 2017 , similar to DT increase of 2.2 ± 0.1 ppm between 2016 and 2017 . In DT 1960s , DT JJ growth rate of atmospheric carbon dioxide was roughly 0.6 ± 0.1 ppm per NN . Over DT past decade , however , DT growth rate has been closer to 2.3 ppm per NN . DT annual rate of increase in atmospheric carbon dioxide over DT past 60 NNS is about 100 times faster than previous natural increases , such as those WDT occurred at DT end of DT last NN age 11,000 - 17,000 NNS ago . Carbon dioxide is a greenhouse gas : a gas WDT absorbs and radiates heat . Warmed by sunlight , NNP ’s land and ocean surfaces continuously radiate thermal infrared NN ( heat ) . Unlike oxygen or nitrogen ( which make up most of our atmosphere ) , greenhouse gases absorb DT heat and release PRP gradually over NN , IN bricks in a fireplace after DT fire goes out . Without this natural greenhouse effect , NNP ’s average annual temperature MD be below freezing instead of close to 60 °F . But increases in greenhouse gases have tipped DT NNP 's NN budget out of balance , trapping additional heat and raising NNP 's average temperature . Carbon dioxide is DT most important of NNP ’s long - lived greenhouse gases . PRP absorbs less heat per molecule than DT greenhouse gases methane or nitrous oxide , but PRP ’s more abundant and PRP stays in DT atmosphere much longer . And while carbon dioxide is less abundant and less powerful than NN vapor on a molecule per molecule basis , PRP absorbs wavelengths of thermal NN WDT NN vapor does not , which means PRP adds to DT greenhouse effect in a unique way . Increases in atmospheric carbon dioxide are responsible for about two - thirds of DT total NN imbalance WDT is causing NNP 's temperature to rise . Another reason carbon dioxide is important in DT NNP system is IN PRP dissolves into DT ocean IN DT fizz in a can of soda . PRP reacts with NN molecules , producing carbonic acid and lowering DT ocean 's pH . Since DT start of DT Industrial Revolution , DT pH of DT ocean 's surface waters has dropped from 8.21 to 8.10 . This drop in pH is called ocean acidification . A drop of 0.1 MD not seem IN a lot , but DT pH scale is logarithmic ; a 1 - unit drop in pH means a tenfold increase in acidity . A NN of 0.1 means a roughly 30 % increase in acidity . Increasing acidity interferes with DT ability of marine life to extract calcium from DT NN to build their shells and skeletons . Natural increases in carbon dioxide concentrations have periodically warmed NNP ’s temperature during NN age cycles over DT past million NNS or more . DT warm episodes ( interglacials ) began with a small increase in sunlight due to a tiny wobble in NNP ’s axis of rotation or in DT path of its orbit around DT Sun . DT little bit of extra sunlight caused a little bit of NN . As DT oceans warmed , PRP outgassed carbon dioxide — IN a can of soda VBG flat in DT heat of a summer day . DT extra carbon dioxide in DT atmosphere amplified DT initial NN . Based on air bubbles trapped in mile - thick NN cores ( and other paleoclimate evidence ) , PRP VBP IN during DT NN age cycles of DT past million NNS or so , carbon dioxide never exceeded 300 ppm . Before DT Industrial Revolution started in DT mid-1700s , DT JJ average amount of carbon dioxide was about 280 ppm . By DT NN continuous observations began at Mauna Loa Volcanic Observatory in 1958 , JJ atmospheric carbon dioxide was already 315 ppm . On NNP 9 , 2013 , DT daily average carbon dioxide measured at Mauna Loa surpassed 400 ppm for DT first NN on record . Less than two NNS later , in 2015 , DT JJ amount went over 400 ppm for DT first NN . If JJ NN demand continues to grow and to be met mostly with fossil fuels , atmospheric carbon dioxide is projected to exceed 900 ppm by DT end of this century . Collins , M. , R. Knutti , J. text: Melbourne , 25 June 2012 : Australian infectious NN therapy and NN development company BioDiem Ltd ( ASX : BDM ) announced today DT signing of a licensing agreement with Australian National University ( ANU ) . This agreement is for an exclusive JJ license to commercialise a novel NN technology from DT John Curtin School of NNP Research at ANU . Dengue Fever is DT lead indication , but DT technology MD RB facilitate DT design of NNS against a number of other infectious diseases including Murray River encephalitis and Japanese encephalitis . DT increasing incidence of mosquito - borne NN is a major NN concern worldwide as NN NN expands DT range of DT carrier mosquitoes , exposing larger human populations . DT agreement includes provision for BioDiem to sublicense DT technology . Industry standard royalties apply , but apart from a small contribution towards patent registration costs EX is no up - front outlay for BioDiem . DT agreement follows DT signing of a term sheet announced to DT ASX on 6 June 2012 . Dengue Fever is a NN caused by a mosquito - borne NN WDT affects between 50 and 100 million NNS a NN , and according to DT NNP NNP Organization DT incidence is increasing significantly . Although only a small percentage of NNS are fatal , non-fatal NNS can be extremely debilitating . Dengue Fever currently has no existing NN , and control methods currently include attempts to address mosquito populations with varying effectiveness . DT technology is complementary to DT BioDiem portfolio as well as DT company 's strategic focus on NNS and therapies for infectious diseases and related cancers . " PRP are delighted to announce DT completion of this licensing agreement , which sees BioDiem 's commercial expertise in DT area of NNS fittingly partnered with DT exciting research developed by ANU . Our focus on infectious diseases is an excellent fit for this JJ technology which has strong potential as an asset for outlicensing " VBD BioDiem CEO Julie Phillips . BioDiem 's current strategy for DT ANU technology includes leveraging DT company 's JJ partnering network to deliver an outlicensing partner for development of DT technology , providing an opportunity to secure a royalties stream without significant development costs on DT part of BioDiem . BioDiem is an ASX - listed company based in Melbourne with an international focus on discovering , developing and commercialising NN - class research and technology targeting cancers and infectious diseases . BioDiem 's core technologies include DT Live Attenuated Influenza NNP ( LAIV ) , DT SAVINE platform and DT BDM - I antimicrobial compound . DT LAIV influenza NN is an intranasal NN to prevent infection from seasonal and pandemic influenza . DT LAIV influenza NN can be produced using both egg - based and cell - based manufacturing methods . DT cell - based LAIV NN has completed a Phase II clinical trial in Europe . DT egg - based LAIV NN technology is licensed to DT NNP NNP Organization as part of DT NNP Pandemic Influenza Action Plan to Increase NNP Supply . DT LAIV influenza NN is marketed as Nasovac™ in India by DT Serum Institute of India , and has been licensed to NNP - based Changchun BCHT Biotechnology Co . DT LAIV NN was in - licensed from DT Institute of Experimental Medicine in St Petersburg , Russia where PRP has been used for over a decade in JJ millions of NNS - NNS , adults and DT elderly . DT LAIV is administered by nasal spray and induces a rapid immune response in DT mucosal lining of DT nose and pharynx . DT LAIV is RB being developed as a viral vector for making novel non-influenza NNS for different diseases including cancers . Viruses have DT ability to generate proteins prolifically and can be programmed to produce NN - specific proteins . As part of a NN , NN - specific proteins can help generate a beneficial immune response . SAVINE ( patented Scrambled Antigen NNP ) is a platform technology for DT design of antigens for incorporation into NNS targeting an immune response to a range of different diseases . SAVINE antigens are encoded as synthetic genes which , together with a delivery technology such as BioDiem 's LAIV - based NN vector technology , can be used to develop novel NNS . BDM - I is a synthetic compound targeted at DT treatment of serious human infections . BDM - I is in DT preclinical stage with outlicensing as DT intended outcome . BDM - I is active against a range of pathogenic micro-organisms including gram - positive and gram - negative bacteria , fungi and protozoa . Key patents have been filed around BDM - I 's antimicrobial activity , including for activity against Plasmodium falciparum , responsible for causing DT most commonly severe form of malaria , and Trichomonas vaginalis , DT protozoan responsible for causing a common sexually transmitted NN named trichomoniasis . BioDiem is RB developing BDM-E , a tetra peptide synthetic compound , as a treatment for ophthalmic disorders . DT NNP Food & Drug Administration ( USFDA ) has granted Orphan Drug designation to BDM-E for DT treatment of retinitis pigmentosa , a serious degenerative NN of DT retina . BioDiem 's research is ongoing in partnership with internationally recognised laboratories . For additional information , please visit www.biodiem.com

John Quincy Adams was DT eldest son of NNP John Adams and DT sixth NN of DT NNP NNPS . In his pre-presidential NNS , Adams was CD of America 's greatest diplomats ( formulating , among other things , what became DT Monroe Doctrine ) ; in his post - presidential NNS , he conducted a consistent and often dramatic fight against DT expansion of slavery . Though full of promise , his presidential NNS were difficult . He died in 1848 in Washington , D.C . Born on July 11 , 1767 , in Braintree , Massachusetts , John Quincy was DT son of John Adams , a prodigy of DT American Revolution who MD become DT second U.S. NN just before his John Quincy 's 30th birthday , and his wife , future first lady Abigail Adams . As a child , Adams witnessed firsthand DT birth of DT nation . From DT family farm , he and his mother watched DT Battle of Bunker Hill in 1775 . During his NN in DT Senate , he supported DT Louisiana Purchase and NNP Thomas Jefferson 's Embargo Act—actions WDT made him very unpopular with other Federalists . In June 1808 , Adams broke with DT Federalists , resigned from his Senate seat and became a Democratic - Republican . Adams returned to DT diplomatic corps in 1809 , when NNP James Madison appointed him DT first officially recognized minister to Russia ( Francis Dana was never officially accepted as a U.S. ambassador by DT Russian NN ) . DT following NN , Adams served as minister to England , a position his father had held 30 NNS earlier . In a post he was most suited for , Adams served as secretary of NN in NNP James Monroe 's administration from 1817 to 1825 . During this NN , he negotiated DT Adams - Onis Treaty , acquiring Florida for DT NNP NNPS . By 1824 , Adams was well - positioned to be DT next NN of DT NNP NNPS . Running against Adams were Southerners John C. Calhoun and William Crawford , and Westerners Henry Clay and Andrew Jackson . In addition , by DT 1824 election , 18 of 24 NNS had moved to choose electors to DT Electoral College by popular vote instead of to NN legislatures . In DT Electoral College vote , no CD candidate had a clear majority and , subsequently , DT election was sent to DT House of Representatives . Clay threw his support to Adams , who was elected on DT first ballot . Adams 's victory shocked Jackson , who had won DT popular vote and fully expected to be NN . When Adams later appointed Clay secretary of NN , Jackson Democrats cried " corrupt bargain , " and were enraged at DT seemingly quid pro quo arrangement . Adams entered DT presidency with several debilitating political liabilities . He possessed DT temperament of his father : Aloof , stubborn and ferociously independent in his convictions . As NN , Adams failed to develop DT political relationships needed — even among members of his own party — to effect significant NN . PRP did n't help IN his political opponents were set on making him a CD - term NN . text: NN NN - what are PRP doing ? DT council adopted a NNP NNP Strategy in April 2014 , which was refreshed in 2017 to bring PRP up to speed with other local and national developments in DT NN NN agenda . This will outline DT steps WDT PRP ’ll be taking to tackle DT issue and reduce our impact on DT environment . DT drive to become a carbon neutral borough by 2030 starts now and PRP have started work to set out DT steps PRP as a council can take and how PRP can work together as a borough . In December 2019 , PRP held a NN NN summit to bring together ideas with partners . View a copy of DT presentation and DT Outcomes Report . Already PRP have : • Installed solar panels on DT roof of several of our council buildings . • Improved DT NN performance of DT council ’s Deanes and Parklands buildings • Set up a group of Environment Champions to promote sustainable practices among staff . • Installed a fresh air cooling system at DT Civic Offices , as well as being environmentally - friendly , DT initiative will generate a saving of £ 9,500 per NN . • Reduced DT distances our bin trucks travel by rebalancing DT rounds , with a monthly carbon saving of 3.8 % per month . With partners , PRP have : • Adopted a transport strategy with a focus on encouraging more sustainable transport including cycling and walking . • Given out loans and grants to improve insulation and install renewable NN sources . • Supported residents to apply for NN funding for NN efficient boilers . PRP are working on our next steps looking at greener ways of delivering council services . When asked if he still believed DT UN was trying to impose a worldwide NN through NN NN policy , Mr Roberts answered : “ Definitely ” . In 2011 , Mr Roberts wrote a letter to then Australian Prime Minister Julia Gillard demanding to be exempted from DT country ’s carbon tax . DT letter , addressed to “ DT Woman , Julia - Eileen : Gillard ” , contained a 28 - point affidavit WDT sought to establish Mr Roberts ’ exemption from DT need to obey DT Australian NN . DT use of unusual grammar and punctuation by sovereign citizens is intended to establish independence from DT NN ’s legal system . text: NNS often confuse DT concepts of JJ NN and NN NN , and PRP does n’t help IN NN companies often substitute CD for DT other in TV , newspaper , and social NN reporting . This is somewhat understandable since DT two concepts overlap a great deal . In fact , EX is a causal relationship between DT two . However , EX are some subtle and some not - so - subtle differences between JJ NN and NN NN . DT phrase JJ NN is used by NNS to mean a long - term increase in NNP ’s average air temperature . PRP can refer specifically to such NN WDT is due to DT influence of rising concentrations of greenhouse gases in DT atmosphere . NNP ’s surface gets most of its heat from DT NN associated with DT Sun ’s rays , which strike DT NN ’s surface during DT day . At night most of this NN is radiated back into space . Greenhouse gases ( such as carbon dioxide , methane , nitrous oxides , and chlorofluorocarbons [ CFCs ] ) absorb infrared radiation ( net heat NN ) emitted from NNP ’s surface and radiate PRP back to DT surface , thus contributing to DT greenhouse effect . Though DT recent rise in greenhouse gases in DT atmosphere is arguably DT main factor affecting JJ NN , other factors are involved ( such as variations in NNP ’s orbit , DT angle of DT NN ’s axis , and variations in DT Sun ’s NN output ) . Nevertheless , as higher concentrations of greenhouse gases allow NNP ’s atmosphere to hold on to greater amounts of heat WDT MD normally escape into space at night , NNP ’s average temperature rises . NN NN is a bit different . Before PRP look into what NN NN is , PRP MD be helpful to VB a bit about NN with respect to weather . Weather , which is often confused with NN , is DT set of conditions in DT atmosphere in CD location for a limited period of NN , such as throughout DT day , at night , or at any particular point during DT day . NN , on DT other hand , is DT average condition of DT atmosphere in a given location over a long period of NN , such as 30 NNS or more . Thus , NN NN is a longer - term NN in DT average condition of DT atmosphere . Human beings most certainly contribute to NN NN by adding greenhouse gases to DT atmosphere , but this is only part of DT equation . NNP ’s NN can VB over NN not only because of changes in DT atmosphere but RB because of interactions between DT atmosphere and various geologic , chemical , biological , and geographic factors . For example , regional climates ( as well as NNP ’s JJ NN ) can VB in response to a sustained period of heavy volcanic activity . Over hundreds of thousands to millions of NNS , DT continents collide with other continents or break apart , changing DT paths of ocean currents and local winds . This affects DT transport of heat from DT tropics to DT poles . NNP ’s JJ NN has RB changed in response to drastic changes in atmospheric chemistry — notably DT rise in oxygen concentrations billions of NNS ago when plants , algae , and other forms of life capable of photosynthesis began to spread across DT NN . As DT NN continues to come to grips with how human activities influence NNP ’s NN , DT tangible effects of NN NN WDT is caused by JJ NN — such as melting glaciers and NN caps , rising NN levels , and changes in seasonal temperature and rainfall patterns — are becoming DT focus . With such disruptions becoming more and more apparent , JJ NNS are discussing them increasingly in terms of real long - term climatic changes rather than simply remarking about NNP ’s average temperature . text: How To Discuss “ NN NN ” With A ‘ Woke ’ Teenager After our daughter of fifteen NNS of age was moved to tears by DT speech of Greta Thunberg at DT UN DT other day , she became angry with our generation “ who had been doing nothing for thirty NNS . ” So , PRP decided to help her prevent what DT girl on TV announced of “ massive eradication and DT disappearance of entire ecosystems . ” PRP are now committed to give our daughter a future again , by doing our part to help cool DT NN four degrees . From now on she will VB to school on a bicycle , because driving her by car costs fuel , and fuel puts NNS into DT atmosphere . Of course PRP will be winter soon and then she will VB to VB by bus , but cycling through DT freezing builds resilience . Of course , she is now asking for an electric bicycle , but PRP have shown her DT devastation caused to DT areas of DT NN as a result of mining for DT extraction of Lithium and other minerals used to make batteries for electric bicycles , so she will be pedaling , or walking . Which will not harm her , or DT NN . PRP used to cycle and walk to school too . Since DT girl on TV demanded “ PRP need to VB rid of our dependency on fossil fuels ” and our daughter agreed with her , PRP have disconnected DT heat vent in her room . DT temperature is now dropping to twelve degrees in DT evening , and will drop below freezing in DT winter , PRP have promised to buy her an extra sweater , hat , tights , gloves and a blanket . For DT same reason PRP have decided IN from now on she only takes a cold shower . She will wash her clothes by hand , with a wooden washboard , because DT washing machine is simply a power consumer and since DT dryer uses natural gas , she will hang her clothes on DT clothes line to dry , just IN my parents and grandparents used to do . Speaking of clothes , DT ones WDT she currently has are all synthetic , so made from petroleum . Therefore on Monday , PRP will bring all her designer clothing to DT secondhand shop . PRP have found an eco store where DT only clothing PRP sell is made from undyed and unbleached linen and jute . RB ca n’t have clothes made on wool , because DT NNS from farting sheep are supposedly causing bad weather . PRP should n’t matter IN PRP looks good on her , or IN she is VBG to be laughed at , dressing in colorless , bland clothes and without a wireless bra , but DT is DT price she has to pay for DT benefit of DT NNP . Cotton is out of DT question , as PRP comes from distant lands and pesticides are used for PRP . Very bad for DT environment . PRP just saw on her Instagram IN she ’s pretty angry with PRP . This was not our intention . From now on , at 7 p.m. PRP will turn off DT WiFi and PRP will only switch PRP on again DT next day after dinner for two hours . In this way PRP will save on electricity , so she is not bothered by electro - stress and will be totally isolated from DT outside NN . This way , she can concentrate solely on her homework . At eleven o’clock in DT evening PRP will pull DT breaker to shut DT power off to her room , so she knows IN dark is really dark . DT will save a lot of CO2 . She will no longer be participating in winter sports to ski lodges and resorts , nor will she be VBG on anymore vacations with PRP , because our vacation destinations are practically inaccessible by bicycle . Since our daughter fully agrees with DT girl on TV IN DT CO2 NNS and footprints of her great - grandparents are to blame for ‘ killing our NN ’ , what all this simply means , is IN she RB has to live IN her great - grandparents and PRP never had a holiday , a car or even a bicycle . PRP have n’t talked about DT carbon footprint of food yet . Zero CO2 footprint means no meat , no fish and no poultry , but RB no meat substitutes WDT are based on soy ( after all , WDT grows in farmers fields , WDT use machinery to harvest DT beans , trucks to transport to DT processing plants , where more NN is used , then trucked to DT packaging / canning plants , and trucked once again to DT stores ) and RB no imported food , because DT has a negative ecological effect . And absolutely no chocolate from Africa , no coffee from South America and no tea from Asia . Only homegrown potatoes , vegetables and fruit WDT have been grown in local cold soil , because greenhouses run on boilers , piped in CO2 and artificial light . Apparently , these things are RB bad for DT NNP . PRP will teach her how to grow her own food . Bread is still possible , but butter , milk , cheese and yogurt , cottage cheese and cream come from cows and PRP emit CO2 . No more margarine and no oils will be used for DT frying pan , because DT fat is palm oil from plantations in Borneo where rain forests first grew . No NN cream in DT summer . No soft drinks and no NN drinks , as DT bubbles are CO2 . PRP will RB ban all plastic , because PRP comes from chemical factories . Everything made of steel and aluminum must RB be removed . Have PRP ever seen DT amount of NN a blast furnace consumes or an aluminum smelter ? All bad for DT NN ! PRP will replace her memory foam pillow top mattress , with a jute bag filled with straw , with a horse hair pillow . And finally , she will no longer be using makeup , soap , shampoo , cream , lotion , conditioner , toothpaste and medication . Facewashers will all be linen , IN she can wash by hand , with her wooden washboard , just IN her female ancestors did before NN NN made her angry at PRP for destroying her future . In this way PRP will help her to do her part to prevent mass extinction , NN levels rising and DT disappearance of entire ecosystems . If she truly believes she wants to walk DT talk of DT girl on TV , she will gladly accept and happily embrace her JJ way of life . This article was posted : Wednesday , December 4 , 2019 at 5:24 am

text: BIR SALAH , TUNISIA - Samira Sghaier and a group of friends prune moringa trees under a searing sun , dropping fistfuls of leafy branches into plastic tubs . Prickly acacias edge DT plot of land , protecting bone - dry soil from further erosion . Sghaier ’s father once grew olive and fruit trees — varieties WDT mostly shriveled and died under her watch . “ EX has n’t been enough rain in recent NNS , ” says DT 52 - NN - old farmer . Her tiny farm in eastern Tunisia is a bellwether for DT dramatic environmental changes already reshaping North Africa , which threaten to intensify with NN NN . Sandwiched between an encroaching Sahara and a VBG Mediterranean NNP , DT region has seen a sharp drop in rainfall over DT past half century — a trend experts say will likely intensify in DT coming decades . Indeed , over DT course of this century parts of North Africa as well as DT Middle East might become uninhabitable , according to DT German research and policy organization , DT Max Planck Institute . “ PRP ’re seeing higher temperatures and increasing NN stress , ” says Essia Guezzi , NN and NN project officer for conservation group WWF North Africa , summing up some of DT regional challenges . Meanwhile , rising NN levels threaten DT region ’s largely coastal populations , she and others note . These and other issues will come into sharp focus during next month ’s NN summit in Spain , a fellow member of DT Mediterranean region WDT is considered a NN hotspot — more vulnerable to DT effects of NN NN than other parts of DT NN . While Morocco has earned praise as a NN - NN leader , DT North African region overall needs to do much more to counter an otherwise grim future , experts say . RB hampering efforts : some NNS are buffeted by conflict and civil unrest , while fossil fuels continue to drive Algerian and Libyan economies . DT effects of NN NN are likely to slow DT country ’s growth , hitting two major revenue drivers — tourism and agriculture — according to a 2018 report by DT Netherlands Foreign Ministry . text: Here PRP see swaddling clothes for DT baby - and a shroud for DT mother . Here PRP see a baby 's cradle connected tragically with a woman 's coffin . Here PRP hear a birth cry and a death gurgle at CD and DT same NN . DT dying mother 's last act was to name her child . " And she named DT child Ichabod . " And her last testimony was - as she thought upon DT ark of God being taken by DT Philistines - " DT glory is departed from Israel . " PRP was goodbye to glory ! " Let PRP make some applications of DT statement , even though PRP MD appear as those who carve epitaphs on tombstones , or as those who write obituaries , or as those who wailingly and discordantly participate in funeral dirges . Though PRP MD be asking PRP to look through old windows upon scenes which others have described , though PRP MD travel some well - worn and familiar trails , though PRP MD serve DT same food in somewhat different platters , still PRP make bold to ask PRP to remember IN ' tis true ' . A Nation NNP Lose Its Glory DT wife of Phinehas , passing through DT swirling waters of DT river of death , VBD : " DT glory is departed from Israel " Thoughtfully scanning DT pages of history , rubbing DT dust of centuries off DT tombs of some nations WDT underwent DT frightful processes of self - burial , PRP can give DT same testimonies concerning other nations . For 'tis true IN , warmed by DT sun which never loses its glory , a nation 's sun MD set in night . Under DT stars - stars which never lose their splendor a nation 's starry crown MD lose its brightness , being displaced by a withered wreath of poison ivy or a circle of undesirable cactus , or by DT brow becoming an eyeless , earless , tongueless , brainless skull . Beneath DT heavens which declare DT glory of God , even as DT firmament showeth His handiwork , a nation WDT circled DT clouds as a strong - winged eagle , can flutter among DT clouds as a broken - winged vulture or squawking parrot . Among DT flowery continents of God a nation can become a place of foul odours WDT make DT righteous stop their noses . [ Ancient Babylon ] Great was DT glory of Babylon of old ; but Babylon became a vermin- infested , animal - prowling jungle - Babylon , " DT glory of kingdoms , DT beauty of DT Chaldees ' excellency , " became " as when God overthrew Sodom and Gomorrah . " Something of DT tragic departure of its glory is told in these words : " PRP shall never be inhabited , neither shall PRP be dwelt in from generation to generation : neither shall DT Arabian pitch tent RB ; neither shall DT shepherds make their fold RB . But wild beasts of DT desert shall lie RB ; and their houses shall he full of doleful creatures ; and owls shall dwell RB , and satyrs shall dance RB . And DT wild beasts of DT islands shall cry in their desolate houses and dragons in their pleasant palaces : and her NN is near to come , and her days shall not be prolonged . " - Isaiah 13:20 - 22 . [ Ancient Carthage ] Great was DT glory of Carthage centuries ago . But her commanders became as impotent as skeletons of cattle scattered on desert sands . Her swift feet became as a cripple 's walk - her clenched fist as DT fumbling fingers of a paralytic . [ Ancient Syria ] Wondrous DT glory of Syria at a NN when Eleanor 's troubadours at Antioch bewitched DT Syrian air with ballads of DT South - and lightened DT horrors of DT second crusade . But Syria 's glory departed when DT following was VBN . " But this NNS hath a revolting and a rebellious heart ; PRP are revolted and gone . " - Jeremiah 5:23 . [ Ancient Greece ] Great was DT glory of ancient Greece - especially from 450 B.C. to 350 B.C. - under Pericles . But Greece became a moulded crust in history 's garbage heap . Greece had her Athens -- civilization 's queen . Plato was hers . Socrates was hers . A vast multitude of seers was hers . Phidias , raising beautiful NNS unto Athens from DT sterile womb of stone , marbled JJ places with sculptured wonders . DT Muses tented in her gates and plumed DT arts with eagle 's wings . At JJ shrines DT human brain bowed in reverence . But with all these persons , with all these things of beauty , Greece became a moulded crust in history 's garbage can . [ Ancient Rome ] Great DT glory of DT Rome of centuries far back and forever gone - especially from 50 B.C. to 60 A.D. - with her astute statesmen , with her close - meshed code of laws , with her sword - woven mantle , coin - embroidered , WDT fell on cities where merchants congregated and fattened on DT spoils of trade , with her armies WDT feasted and fattened on blood . Rome was mighty among DT kingdoms - mighty wherever ships and swords and thrones and lust of gold and sovereignty constituted DT boasted heritage of DT age . But Rome and her glory became as a mouth full of pyorrheic gums holding rotten teeth , all loose and foul . [ Ancient Nineveh ] Great DT glory of DT nation - JJ realm of Nineveh - with her winged lions symbolic of strength and speed . But Nineveh became as a vari-colored butterfly enmeshed and perishing in DT net of a relentless spider . [ Ancient Egypt ] Great DT glory of old ancient Egypt - DT land of DT Pharaohs - DT land of wealth and wonders . But PRP became a shabby sexton of splendid tombs - her torch of far - reaching splendor became a pot of smoke without CD spark of remaining radiance . [ Ancient Spain ] Great was DT glory of ancient Spain - back RB in DT glorious NNS beyond recall . Wide and strong was DT sway of her scepter . Her piratical ships harassed all DT seas and filled her coffers with gold . But this nation , with NN and conquests and caches of coin , with thrones and crowns and scepters , with laughter and love and lure , with men and money and might , with fervor and force and fruit , became as a drowsy and lousy and frowsy beggar watching a broken clock . [ Ancient Jerusalem ] And let PRP ask PRP to VB of Jerusalem - " beautiful for situation " - as representative of DT nation Israel . Triumphant were her temples . Her past " shines glorious as doth DT moon on midnight seas . " For favoured Jerusalem , kings kneeled down and prayed . For glorious Jerusalem , prophets , in tears and love , served . For beautiful Jerusalem , martyrs shriveled into flame . In Jerusalem 's virgin face were eyes in which , deep - folded , lay prophecies of DT Son of God . But because within her sacred courts evil was girt with diadem , Jerusalem hardened her heart . Jerusalem bloodied her hands . Jerusalem deafened her ears . Jerusalem played DT harlot . And Jesus described her then departing and afterward utterly departed glory in these words , " Thy house is left unto thee desolate . " Covered this blood - soaked NN with DT wreck of once - glorious cities . Scarred DT face of this war - blighted NN with DT ruin of once - glorious nations . Marred DT fair face of this NN with DT wreck of once - glorious civilizations - civilizations which have left behind them nothing but DT smoke of DT brilliant torch , nothing more than an empty name , nothing more than DT shadow of a shadow . What DT Bible says about some nations and some cities - representatives in large measure of once - proud , once - strong , once - influential civilizations - is true of other nations and cities of DT past and DT present : " For I have sworn by myself , saith DT Lord , IN Bozrah shall become a desolation , a reproach , a waste , and a curse ; and all DT cities thereof shall be perpetual wastes ... " RB Edom shall be a desolation . every CD WDT goeth by PRP shall be astonished , and shall hiss at all DT plagues thereof ... " And Hazor shall be a dwelling for dragons , and a desolation for ever ; EX shall no man abide RB , nor any son of man dwell in PRP . "- Jeremiah 49:13,17,33 . " This is DT rejoicing city WDT dwelt carelessly , DT VBD in her heart , I am , and EX is none beside me : how is she become a desolation , a place for beasts to lie down in ! every CD DT passeth by her shall hiss , and wag his hand . " - Zephaniah 2:15 . In America PRP must remember IN DT glory of a nation is righteousness and faith in God - and VBG DT way God points - and in such is our security against all foes , our immunity against DT ravages of NN . " For DT nation and kingdom WDT will not serve thee shall perish , yea , those nations shall be utterly wasted . " - Isaiah 60:12 . This sober truth WDT only righteousness exalteth a nation -- IN if ever America loses her faith in God she will have to come off her pedestal , IN pallbearers WDT carried other nations to their graves will do work for PRP if PRP forsake God and refuse to VB DT way He points -- was put upon our hearts once by DT editor of DT Watchman - Examiner in these words : " PRP should remember IN CD hundred NNS ago Germany was regarded as DT most Christian nation in Europe . Germany 's evangelicalism was once so pronounced IN Martin Luther gave PRP DT marvelous translation of DT Scriptures and directed DT NN to DT Bible . DT Scriptures so influenced DT Home , DT School , and DT Church of Germany WDT DT national life saw a phenomenal progress . Germany was now making terrific strides in NN , art , and culture . Then came a day when innate conceit got to work . Christianity was emasculated . Christ was rationalized to be nothing more than a good man . DT Holy Scriptures were reduced to a crazy quilt . Religion came to be built on negatives . God was dwarfed and man was deified . ' Let DT strong survive , ' became DT JJ religion . Germany was decivilized and Hitler had no trouble getting his followers to arm to DT hilt to conquer DT NN . " Let PRP ask DT help of Almighty God in these days when men " loose wild tongues WDT hold not God in awe , " when EX are evils WDT MD lead our greatest graces to DT grave and leave DT NN no copy . When DT atheistic deformities of our times MD coerce PRP into substituting for Christianity 's vital bread a chunk of froth scattered by miasmatic winds - lest our country become a despised Ichabod among DT nations of NN . A Church NNP Lose Her Glory " Thy glory hath departed " Too bad and too sad when DT is spoken of a church about which glorious things once were spoken . ' Tis tragic , 'tis true IN of some churches such is DT epitaphic description of their decay , their inverted torch , their oil - less lamps , their turning back in DT day of battle - though armed and carrying bows . DT is grief for angels . DT is laughter for devils . DT is gloating for Satan . DT is groaning for Christ 's followers . A church can " leave its first love " DT church at Ephesus did - and needed to " repent and do DT first works " Revelation 2:4,5 . A church can VB from an army into an ecclesiastical nursery wherein DT preacher is looked upon as a head nurse who has more to do with milk bottles for sickly saints than with mighty battles against seductive Satan . Then does its glory depart . A church can VB from a church of compassionate concern into a church of callisthenic conventionality utterly devoid of devotional vitality - censorious of spiritual and far - sighted leadership , worldly , wayward , and peevishly puny . Then can Ichabod be written over its portals , its pews , its pulpit . A church can VB from a cataract of activity into a scum - covered pond of stagnation . Thus , forgetting IN " she IN liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth , " she hastens DT departure of her glory . A church can VB from a church of aggressive conquest into a church possessive of a slothful timidity , a passive acquiescence in small attainments , a criminal spineless in DT face of evils WDT arrogantly challenge , a careless in - difference to great stretches of DT unattained . Thus is Ichabod an appropriate adjective for its activities and aimlessness . A church can be a roller of marbles when PRP should be a remover of mountains . Thus does its spiritual muscle become flabby , its fingers fumbling , its feet halt - as DT glory departs . A church can put its headlight on DT rear and VB only of DT glory WDT was . Then and thus does its light grow dim , its voice faltering , its spiritual ambitions anemic , its worship boresomely lacking in life , its glory NN of DT past . Pathetic DT words WDT fell from DT Master 's lips . " And as he went out of DT temple , CD of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here ! And Jesus answering VBD unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? EX shall not be left CD stone upon another , WDT shall not be thrown down " Mark 13:1,2 . PRP were great buildings . PRP were magnificent stones . But to his eyes PRP were nothing more than ruins , for DT glory of DT temple 's worship and service had departed . " But DT Lord VBD unto Samuel , Look not on his countenance , or on DT height of his stature ; because I have refused him : for DT Lord seeth not as man seeth ; for man looketh on DT outward appearance , but DT Lord looketh on DT heart " - I Sam . 16:7 . Outwardly DT beautiful and stately temple seemed destined to " defy DT tooth of NN . " Inwardly PRP was hollow and empty and tottering to its fall . Write " Ichabod " upon PRP . Is PRP possible for a church , when God calls PRP to " launch out into DT deep " in DT matter of soul - winning , to become " a drifting sepulcher manned by a frozen crew ? " Well , when academic luster takes DT place of spiritual passion , when refrigeration is valued above conflagration , such is DT danger . I once heard Dr. Perry Webb say : " DT atmosphere in some churches is so cold , PRP can skate down DT aisles . " Is PRP true IN a church MD be noted for DT gorgeous architecture of its building , DT lovely music of its choir , DT stateliness of its ritual , DT fine - functioning of all its organizations , DT largeness of numbers as to its congregation , DT influence in JJ circles of business and social and educational life - and yet be , in DT eyes of Him who marks DT sparrow 's fall , as a corpse wrapped in an ornate shroud ? Of DT church at Sardis , Jesus , risen and enthroned , VBD : " And unto DT angel of DT church in Sardis write , These things saith he WDT hath DT seven Spirits of God , and DT seven stars ; I VBP thy works , IN thou hast a name WDT thou livest , and art dead . " - Revelation 3:1 . Somebody described another church IN unto DT church at Sardis in these words : Outwardly splendid as of old - Inwardly sparkless , void and cold - Her force and fire all spent and gone - IN DT dead moon she still shines on . R.T. Ketcham once VBD : " Attend church , but do not attend a church which prefers NN to Scripture , reason for revelation , theories for truth , culture for conversion , benevolence for blood , goodness for grace , sociability for spirituality , play for praise , pep for prayer , profession for possession , progress for power , reformation for regeneration , good for God , speculation for salvation , jubilation for justification , feelings for faith , paralysis for peace , politics for precepts . " To this I make additional comment saying IN a church deserves to have Ichabod written from its lowest cellar step to DT sky - touching point of its steeple which prefers DT adulation of saints to ardent anxieties concerning lost sinners as well as abhorrence of DT which is evil . Glory yields up its scepter - when DT fancies of literary notables have place along with DT facts of DT gospel , when EX is DT frivolity of DT flesh instead of DT fervor of DT spiritual in serving DT Lord - godliness in form only instead of glorying in DT cross of Christ - a groping after eternal verities - and a guessing IN only borders on godliness as to DT certainties of God 's promises instead of a guidance of others into paths of righteousness . Glory " packs its baggage for a CD - way trip " when in DT church NNS are noted for faultfinding instead of being notable for forgiveness - when offense is quickly taken and EX is overlordism instead of DT offering of self for lowly service - when DT making of money means more than DT mastery of money . How can DT glory of DT church be as a sunlit mountain whose position never changes when in DT church EX is playing at DT job and little praying on DT job - when peevishness and petulance predominate over praise - when EX is quarrelsomeness instead of quietness - when EX is frequent rumpus - raising and riotous revelry instead of restfulness , sinfulness instead of saintliness , selfishness instead of service , tattling instead of testimony , tampering with temptation instead of triumph over temptation . " Thy glory hath departed " will be written on NN and known in Heaven of DT church where EX is more yawning over watches than yearning over wanderers - where EX is mere zest and not zealousness in good works . Let PRP so live and give , so love and serve , so watch and pray , IN , if DT individual 's conduct were universalized , PRP MD never be as a hand WDT writes of a church , " Thy glory hath departed . " DT true glory of a church consists : " in DT purity of its members ; in its spiritual progress ; in DT unity of its fellowship ; in DT spiritual NNS born into its household of faith ; in its self - sacrificing spirit toward others ; and in DT prayer life of DT whole group . When a church is in a healthy condition hypocrisy will be limited ; progress in purity will be constant ; strife and discord will disappear ; sympathy for DT lost will seek means for their rescue ; recruits will outnumber DT losses from backsliding , removal , and death ; private devotion will be a pleasure , family religion a joy , and JJ worship a sought delight . " Along with this let PRP remember IN any church will undergo DT frightful processes of dishonorable self - burial where EX is a lax theology WDT advocates a mutilated Bible , a minimized sin , a deified man , a humanized Christ - substituting human opinions and speculations for DT revealed pronouncements of God concerning DT Bible , concerning DT nature of men , concerning DT terrors of sin , concerning DT deity of Christ , concerning DT meaning of Christ 's death on DT cross , concerning DT plan of salvation , concerning Hell , concerning Heaven . A Home MD Lose Its Glory Yet , glorious as DT glory of a real home is , DT glory can depart - sometimes does depart - assuredly will depart - if DT things " down under " Christian ideals , sordidly below Christian standards for a home - VB DT upper hand and put their oppressive heels upon DT virtues which MD weave wedding garments instead of shrouds on DT home loom . Answer these questions : Are EX not JJ homes WDT are polluted reservoirs from which muddy streams WDT carry deadly contamination flow ? Are EX not JJ homes WDT are grindstones on which DT Devil sharpens his weapons of wickedness ? DT glory of a home departs when parents walk on DT edges of mental abysses - talking nonsense . DT glory of a home will assuredly leave a home as a flower wilts under heavy frost - when parents , by neglect or omission in spiritual matters , send NNS out to NN in paper boats , as though seas did not drown , - when parents , in matters momentous as to issue in stainlessness of morals , permit NNS , in daring defiance of Christian conduct , to walk bare - footed on live coals , as though fire did not burn . Today so JJ homes die in houses . Today JJ who VBP better , living for things WDT matter least , neglecting things WDT matter most , are content with houses in which EX are no homes . In pioneer days , wolves often attacked NNS . In remote mountain districts eagles did DT same . Out West Indians attempted to destroy DT home of settlers . On battlefields vultures have eaten DT sons of women . Now vultures of evil literature attack our NNS . Now poisonous serpents are in every pathway PRP tread . Now DT jackals of sex familiarity are fed by precept and example . Now DT leaping leopards of lust ; Now DT vultures of infidelity in ministry and press ; Now barnyard morality ; Now demagogues who ravage DT land ; Now DT buzzards of liquor traffic on every corner - permitted RB by DT NNP NNPS NNP ; Now DT theory of evolution in most schools - evolution , DT antithesis of Christianity ; Now modernism choosing DT livery of Heaven to serve DT Devil in ; Now godless scholarship summoning DT Bible to appear at DT bar of human reason ; Now all these infest our land . All of which is to say IN - no explorer amid DT wilds of DT North , no adventurer amid unexplored jungles , no doctor amid deadly contagions of NN - ever had to face as JJ dangers as our NNS of today face : their morals , their spiritual welfare , their mental wealth , their soul 's salvation considered . Parental delinquency makes glory depart from a home . Are PRP unfair to say IN behind every delinquent child is a delinquent parent ? Are PRP ceasing to tell DT truth when PRP say IN behind every broken youth is a broken home ? Do PRP not speak words of truth when PRP say IN behind every broken home is a neglect of God in DT home ? When a fifteen - NN - old unmarried girl , pregnant with child , stands before DT court and VBZ IN she does not consider she has done wrong - no more than thousands of other young girls are doing - where are DT mothers ? When a fourteen - NN - old boy , apprehended for roaming DT streets of a city at early morning hours , stands before DT court with tears in his eyes and asks to be sent to DT NN school - because he knows he MD be happier RB than in his own home - where is DT father ? When young girls smoke a pack of cigarettes a day and dress so skimpily PRP attract DT attention of every goggle - eyed man and boy - do not their mothers DT same ? When boys argue over DT relative " values " and " quick - stirring " powers of advertised brands of liquor - do not their fathers drink booze and vote for legalizing PRP , forgetting IN PRP can control a powder can in a fire as easily as PRP can control booze ? Is EX not too much laxness on DT part of parents toward spiritual values ? Often NNS are allowed to stay out of Sunday School and to miss church services - to remain in almost complete ignorance of DT spiritual values . Is PRP not perilous to NNS , this easy - come , easy - VB attitude of parents ? Is not DT use of intoxicating beverages CD of DT greatest evils responsible for juvenile delinquency ? Are not NNS from homes where indiscriminate drinking is done sent out to " play DT game " with two strikes against them ? Do not thinking NNS believe IN youth delinquency MD be negligible if PRP were not for delinquent adults , especially delinquent parents ? Can CD pass judgment on these young NNS without indictment of ourselves for failure somewhere down DT line ? Do not boys and girls VB into trouble when too much leisure NN is theirs ? Are not city governments extremely unwise to say PRP have no money for further improvement of playgrounds while PRP allot large sums of taxpayers ' money for DT cost of punishing DT youth for committing crimes ? Is PRP not shortsightedness bordering on imbecility to pay so much for DT cost of juvenile delinquency and so little for its prevention ? " Any law should be so framed to penalize DT delinquent parent as well as DT delinquent child . . . PRP must first give God his rightful place in DT American home ... Until DT cardinal principles of God are implanted in DT hearts of DT youth of our nation ... until EX is instilled in DT hearts of DT parents of these youth a God - JJ sense of responsibility in DT home , PRP shall continue to experience wave upon wave of crime , mounting and growing steadily day by day , until PRP reaches a magnitude beyond DT scope of DT law - enforcement agencies and DT American NNS to control . " But if parents distinguish themselves by DT profession of truth , DT worship of God , DT practice of virtue , PRP will be sure to draw others after them ; whereas if PRP are irreligious and un-Christian , PRP are infested fountains WDT poison . Parents can no more dispense with personal piety without malicious influence on NNS than a tree can dispense with sap and bear fruit . Adam and Eve sinned ! And Cain became a murderer . Had PRP not sinned , Abel MD have lived . If a rock is a quotation from DT quarry , if a flower is a quotation from DT garden , if a tree is a quotation from DT forest , if a bird is a quotation from DT flock , if every child is a quotation of his parents - what sort do DT NNS make PRP ? Today DT situation is desperate . Character is at a premium in DT land . Criminality of all kinds is rampant . DT daily prints are filled with record of deeds almost too revolting for JJ consumption . An ever - rising wave of lawlessness is hurling its weight against DT bulwarks of DT nation . Much of this is because of godless homes - because too JJ fathers and mothers have abdicated . How parents ought to rejoice for DT opportunity of living close to God , of hearing DT motion of angel 's wings in DT patter of little NNS , and of being Christlike in DT home . Glory in a home is made secure when Christian conduct is evident . Unless PRP serve God yourselves as parents PRP will plant vines on which will grow grapes of bitterness . " What mean ye , IN ye use this proverb concerning DT land of Israel , saying , DT fathers have eaten sour grapes , and DT NNS 's teeth are set on edge ? " Ezekiel 18:2 Nothing is so infectious as example : " PRP can do more good by being good than in any other way " ( Kingsley ) . " A father who whipped his son for swearing and swore while he whipped him , did more harm by his example than good by his correction " ( Fuller ) . " Noble examples stir PRP up to noble actions " ( Burke ) . " Live with wolves and PRP will learn to howl . " A drinking or drunken father is a poor preacher of sobriety to sons . A proud father is a miserable recommender of humility to sons . PRP will do as PRP do rather than as PRP say . Your example will counteract all DT effect of your counsel - and all DT convictions PRP MD fix in DT mind will fall IN arrows from an impenetrable shield . PRP should therefore begin " both to do and to teach . " PRP should be able , in a humble measure , at least , to say to those under your care : " Be ye followers of me , even as I RB am of Christ ... " " Thou therefore which teachest another , teachest thou not thyself ? Thou IN preachest a man should not steal , dost thou steal ? Thou DT sayest a man should not commit adultery , dost thou commit adultery ? Thou DT abhorrest idols , dost thou commit sacrilege ? Thou DT makest thy boast of DT law , through breaking DT law dishonourest thou God ? " Romans 2:21 - 23 If parents suffered their NNS to VB naked , to beg their bread , to lie unattended in sickness , to perish with hunger in a ditch , PRP MD be shunned as monsters . text: On April 30 , DT nation reported just four NNS , all of them travellers arriving from abroad , marking DT first day with zero local infections in two and a half months . As case numbers have continued to fall , DT NN has cautiously relaxed its guidelines , while signaling a shift to " everyday quarantine " measures , such as wearing masks and temperature checks at schools . NNS 's attitudes have RB relaxed , leading some officials to worry about complacency and a second wave of infections . DT nightclub outbreak MD heighten those fears , but DT NN has already responded aggressively , tracing and testing thousands of NNS in a matter of days . Last mile is DT toughest Though testing companies were quick to respond to DT demand , rolling out DT kits presented difficulties . Through February , demand for tests was still outpacing supply , and EX were only enough kits to distribute to a select number of hospitals . Furthermore , hospitals struggled to administer DT tests to potentially contagious patients safely and quickly — testing areas needed to be sanitised after each patient , long queues meant DT NN MD spread while NNS waited in line , and NN workers were running low on protective gear . At Yangji Hospital , this RB led to exhausted staff , says hospital director Sang Il Kim . " Even when PRP did have kits , DT waiting times were just too long for everybody to VB tested , so PRP MD have to VB to other hospitals , " adds Yoona Chung , a doctor in DT hospital 's surgery department . According to Yangji's data , DT hospital was conducting roughly 10 tests a day by late February — but JJ more were being turned away due to DT wait . Other hospitals in Korea started experimenting with drive - through testing centres , where patients MD VB tested without leaving their cars . But Yangji Hospital is near a subway station in a crowded neighbourhood in southern Seoul ; for JJ of its patients , cars are n't an option . So , Kim devised DT walk - in booths , which went into pilot operation on March 10 . Within days , DT number of tests administered in a day had tripled . By DT end of DT month , DT hospital MD handle more than 90 patients a day . Hospitals elsewhere in Korea and around DT NN quickly adopted their own variations on DT concept . A hospital in Busan had a similar idea independently but others have had help from Kim .

Tom Daschle and Patrick Leahy . These attacks killed five NNS , closed down a Senate office building , caused a national panic , and nearly paralyzed DT postal system . text: Jeff Bradstreet , who has been described as a “ controversial NN researcher , ” has now become DT center of NN rumors after reports of his apparent suicide . His death is VBN to have followed on DT heels of a raid by DT NNP Food and Drug Administration ( FDA ) of his Bradstreet Wellness Center in Buford , Georgia ( update 27JUN2015 : DT Georgia Drugs and Narcotics Agency is reported to have aided in DT raid ) . A fisherman found Bradstreet ’s body in a North Carolina river on Friday , June CD . Authorities in Rutherford County , North Carolina , VBP IN he had a gunshot wound to DT chest , “ which appears to be self - inflicted , ” according to DT local newspaper , DT Gwinnett Daily Post . DT Post RB reports IN DT speculation has spread IN a NN through DT community of NNS who are mourning DT loss of a man whom PRP viewed as a courageous crusader against mainstream medicine and who believe , as Bradstreet argued , IN DT mercury in NNS causes NN ( DT evidence emphatically indicates otherwise ) . According to his website , Bradstreet , whose own son is autistic , embraced a number of unproven or untested interventions for NN , including using stem cells in an overseas NN he chronicles , and hyperbaric oxygen therapy , which DT FDA cracked down on in 2013 . He was known for his use of chelation therapy . As I ’ve written about here before , those who are attracted to NN theories to explain their NN have a tendency to see NN all around them . With DT death of Bradstreet , this tendency is emerging in force . A related fundraiser with DT title “ Finding out DT truth ” references an “ exhaustive investigation into DT possibility of foul play . ” At last look , DT funds raised were in DT low five figures . Some seem to VB IN DT location of DT wound suggests foul play , but about a fifth of suicides by gunshot involve a wound to DT chest . A handgun RB was found in DT river where Bradstreet ’s body was discovered . Studies of NNS who are prone to subscribe to NN theories indicate IN readers drawn to NN - related online NN tend to be more focused on what filters into their narrow , NN - oriented communities , reinforcing confirmation biases and adding fuel to DT conspiratorial machine . In DT NNP , “ conspiracist beliefs , ” which are widespread , correlate with being more likely to use alternative medicine and to shun mainstream medicine , even to DT point of being less likely to have an annual physical . Researchers call DT internet a “ natural medium ” for DT diffusion of NN theories , and DT rapidity with which this NN spread and took hold is no exception .

text: by Ashley AustrewPoliticians are n’t exactly known for being honest . NNP Nixon had DT Watergate scandal . NNP Bill NNP lied about his affair with Monica Lewinsky . And , in DT first two NNS Donald NNP was NN , DT Washington Post reported he ’s made over 8,000 “ false or misleading claims ” to DT American NN . Still , PRP is rare to see a headline declaring any NN or politician a liar . Why is DT ? First of all , what does PRP mean to lie ? DT noun and verb lie are both recorded in Old English by DT 900s . To lie is “ to speak falsely or utter truth knowingly , as with intent to deceive . ” More generally , to lie is “ to express what is false , convey a false impression . ” So , when a person lies , PRP are n’t just sharing false information , PRP ’re doing PRP with DT sinister intent of getting others to believe misleading information . If someone does this habitually , then PRP MD call them a liar , “ a person who tells lies . ” This word is RB attested to in DT 900s . Why do n’t journalists use DT word liar ? DT main reason why JJ journalists avoid accusations of lying is because PRP is difficult to determine CD key word in DT definition above : intent . If a lie is “ a false statement WDT is made with deliberate intent to deceive , ” then calling someone a liar means PRP VBP PRP are intentionally trying to mislead NNS . While JJ of PRP make DT assumption about politicians , PRP ’s different when PRP ’re a member of DT NN tasked with reporting DT NN — not your own conclusions about PRP . David Greenberg , a professor of history and NN studies at Rutgers University and a contributing editor at Politico , wrote in 2017 IN DT NN declaring DT NN a liar MD cross a serious line . DT ’s not to say IN PRP should never be done . Prior to DT Watergate scandal , as Greenberg observed , a National Press Club report found Nixon guilty of “ an unprecedented , NN - wide effort to control , restrict and conceal information ” and “ discredit DT press . ” Still , PRP was n’t until DT Watergate story broke and investigations proved Nixon ’s intent IN DT NN declared DT NN a liar . If DT NN wants to retain their credibility , Greenberg argued , PRP are right to hold back from declaring NNP NNP , or anyone else , a liar . “ Though PRP MD seem fainthearted to use words IN ‘ falsehood ’ and ‘ untruth , ’ in DT long run DT press will have more influence if PRP avoids insinuating more than PRP can confidently assert to be true , ” he wrote . Should journalists use liar anyways ? On January 21 , 2019 , DT Washington Post reported IN , in DT first two NNS of his presidency alone , NNP made 8,158 false claims about DT economy , immigration , trade , foreign policy , and other matters . In just CD instance in March 2019 , NNP wrongly identified Patrick Moore , a man with early involvement in Greenpeace , as a cofounder of DT organization in a tweet about him calling NN NN “ fake NN . ” Greenpeace was quick to correct NNP on DT fact IN Moore was not a cofounder , but DT did n’t VB DT fact IN JJ NNS were exposed to DT tweet and MD have accepted DT NN ’s words as true . Since DT 2016 NNP presidential election , NNS have grown increasingly frustrated with DT NN ’s treatment of JJ figures who lie , with JJ concerned IN PRP live in a post - truth society where facts have become irrelevant . And , PRP ’s not only NNP . DT election brought PRP DT Hillary NNP email scandal , during which NNP VBD she “ never received nor sent any material WDT was marked classified ” on her private email server as Secretary of NNP — a claim IN Politifact characterized as false . During DT 2016 presidential election , Politifact RB found IN 84 percent of claims Ben Carson , now Secretary of DT Department of Housing and Urban Development , made since 2007 were false , including his assertion IN EX are a “ multitude ” of unnecessary NNS available to DT NN . Texas Senator Ted Cruz told lies about 66 percent of DT NN in DT NN frame , including IN “ DT federal NN is VBG after school districts , trying to force them to let boys shower with little girls . ” Blurring DT lines between fact and fiction even more , NNP has popularized DT term fake NN — not to call out actual fake NN but to discredit anyone or anything perceived as unflattering to him . DT strategy has been incredibly effective , and he has succeeded in creating an environment in which DT truth is difficult to discern . JJ argue IN DT NN simply can’t tolerate this level of misinformation anymore . Even journalists are starting to call CD another out . In January , Esquire published an op -ed by journalist Dan Sinker called “ In 2019 , DT NN Has to Do Better in Calling Out NNP ’s Sh*t [ edited ] . ” Sinker noted IN journalists do n’t use words IN lie and liar because PRP ’re supposed to maintain a level of objectivity . Nonetheless , he added : Of course , being objective does n’t mean letting liars lie . “ Balance ” is n’t setting two pundits up to argue over what everyone knows is a false statement . EX ’s no bias in saying something is patently untrue if PRP is , in fact , patently untrue . In fact , saying things are n’t true from jump is kinda DT most important part of DT job . Some major NN organizations have indeed been using DT word liar in content . In August 2018 , DT NNP Yorker ran DT headline “ PRP ’s True : NNP Is Lying More & He ’s Doing PRP On Purpose . ” In October , CNN published “ Donald NNP Lies And He ’s Doing A Lot More of PRP Lately . ” DT Atlantic joined DT call - out in November 2018 with a piece simply titled : “ DT NNP ’s Lies . ” In DT era of fake NN , publications have to contend with DT fact IN any escalation on their part ( i.e. , calling someone a liar ) , RB comes with an escalation in DT intense scrutiny DT NN is already facing . DT NN has DT unique ability to speak truth to power , and DT includes calling out politicians and not allowing them to VB away with lies . EX MD be disagreement on where DT liar line should be , but DT does n’t VB DT fact IN PRP need to draw CD — even if intent is tricky to determine .
