text: SO WHAT’D PRP VBP OF MEGYN KELLY ’S ALEX JONES FEATURE LAST NIGHT ? Putting aside DT fiery debate about whether Kelly and NBC NNP were right to give such primo airtime to a man who has spread dangerous NN theories IN Pizzagate and DT Sandy Hook hoax nonsense , DT question for JJ journalists ahead of last night ’s highly - anticipated “ Sunday Night with Megyn Kelly ” segment was all about how tough Kelly MD prove to be in grilling her controversial subject -- just three weeks into her JJ program , at DT . Given how high DT stakes were as a result of last week ’s JJ outcry , PRP assumes DT editors at NBC NNP were working overtime to make sure DT piece was as tough as possible . And given DT favorable reviews , PRP assumes DT network is happy with DT . -- DT Infowars boss downplayed his relationship with NNP NNP : “ I VBP my influence on NNP is way way lower than what MSM has VBN . ” Kelly : “ Well what kind of access do PRP have ? ” Jones : “ He 's just called sometimes and , PRP VBP , talked about politics or thanked me , stuff IN DT . DT 's PRP . ” -- Ridiculous statement : “ DT NN never covers all DT evil wars PRP ’s promoted . ” Kelly responded , “ DT does n’t excuse what PRP VBD about Newtown , and PRP VBP PRP . ” But really , she coulda / shoulda nailed him on DT “ NN does n’t cover wars ” part . -- This is more IN PRP : “ PRP misstated facts about Chobani and its owner which , PRP MD ’ve found out if PRP just had a reporter do a little shoe - leather reporting -- pick up DT phone , check out DT facts . PRP never MD have had to retract DT or apologize . ” -- “ Do PRP VB of yourself as a journalist ? ” Jones : “ I have some journalists WDT work for me and I do journalistic work and I ’ve broken a lot of big stories and I understand DT basics of PRP . ” If PRP missed PRP last night , PRP can watch DT full clip . Veteran CNN TV critic Brian Lowry : “ [ T ] he piece WDT aired Sunday credibly justified covering DT Infowars phenomenon , which was DT bar WDT " Sunday Night With Megyn Kelly " ultimately had to clear . … Moving into a prosecutorial mode WDT was frequently her strength on Fox , Kelly did press him , enlisting a Newtown parent and MSNBC contributor Charlie Sykes to help contextualize DT ‘ toxic paranoia ’ WDT he spreads among his listeners . … Kelly 's handling of DT interview should calm some nerves [ at NBC NNP ] , even if PRP wo n't quiet all DT dissenting voices . ” Our own Jack Shafer : “ [ S ] he took DT mendacious Jones apart in such a textbook manner PRP had to wonder what all DT shouting had been about . … Short of waterboarding him , I do n’t VB what more Kelly MD have done to expose Jones ’ dark methods . ” TIPS AND COMMENTS : / . Morning NN is edited by Alex Weprin ( / ) and produced with writing / reporting help from Cristiano Lima ( / ) . Archives . Subscribe . EXCERPT - From my feature this morning , “ DT Not - So - Bitter Rivalry of Dean Baquet and Marty Baron , ” over at POLITICO Magazine : “ Baron and Baquet are DT two most important newspaper editors in America right now , at a NN when DT NN is tackling DT most epic and consequential story of DT past 40 NNS . … JJ NN organizations have been moving DT needle on DT NNP story in different ways … But when PRP comes to inside reports from intelligence and national security agencies , DT Times and DT Post , with their expanding rosters of veteran correspondents , have DT greatest institutional advantages . In particular , DT investigations into whether DT NNP team colluded with Russia in DT 2016 election have played to DT historic strengths of both newspapers . … DT result has been a resurgence of ink-stained combat WDT makes NYT v. WaPo DT most compelling journalistic rivalry since DT days of Baquet and Baron ’s respective forefathers , Abe Rosenthal and Ben Bradlee . DT other thing WDT makes DT rivalry compelling is IN unlike Rosenthal and Bradlee , who were cordial at most , Baron and Baquet are legit pals . ... “ And yet , looking back on their journeys to DT ivory towers of American journalism , PRP ’s equally clear IN Baron and Baquet have been formidable competitors , if collegial ones , over DT course of their professional lives . Perhaps no two editors ’ careers have overlapped and shadowed CD another so closely . In DT past , PRP ’ve each contended to be DT top editor at DT NNP York Times and to have all DT power and influence WDT goes along with PRP . After decades of ups and downs for both men , Baquet eventually got DT job , but at DT same NN , Baron got DT glory and fame WDT only DT most Herculanean journalistic achievements can confer . Now , their competition defines not only their careers but , to no small degree , DT fate of DT NNP administration . Every morning , each goes to work knowing IN part of what he needs to do DT day is to be better and faster than DT other . ” DT ’s DT nut graph , in a nutshell . PRP can read DT rest . ( PRP ’s long , so I wo n’t be offended if PRP bookmark and save for later . ) SIDENOTE : SOME POST NUMBERS WDT SURFACED IN MY REPORTING - “ A person with knowledge of company finances VBD DT Post now has more than 900,000 digital - only subscribers at three monthly access levels — $ 3.99 , $ 9.99 and $ 14.99 — with DT majority of its customers registered at DT higher two tiers . Based on those numbers , digital subscriptions MD theoretically be in DT ballpark of $ 100 million at this point . ( In 2016 , digital circulation at DT Times was $ 232.8 million . ) ... Digital advertising this NN , according to DT person with knowledge of company finances , is projected to be at least $ 120 million , up from roughly $ 100 million in 2016 . ( Digital ad revenue at DT Times in 2016 was $ 208.8 million . ) Since DT Post , as opposed to DT Times , is a private company and does not make its finances NN , PRP MD n’t hurt to take these subscription and revenue numbers with a grain of salt . ” -- “ Watching @megynkelly interview with Alex Jones , I 'm even more convinced IN her piece was n't just ok to do , but important journalism . ” [ ] -- “ Bottom line on NBC's Alex Jones piece : Strong editing gave PRP an edge & made him look IN a kook . Still a win for him ; boosts his profile . ” [ ] -- “ If PRP 're unfamiliar with Alex Jones , and are watching this Megyn Kelly report , hard to imagine PRP walk away believing anything he says . And fwiw , I VBP she 's done about as good as anyone can do on TV taking him to task on JJ of his conspiracies . ” [ ] -- “ PRP MD see DT producers cutting and re-cutting PRP to meet various points of objection . ” [ ] BILL O’REILLY TEASES POSSIBLE ‘ JJ NETWORK ’ - : “ Making DT first stop at his ‘ DT Spin Stops Here ’ tour , O’Reilly ... made some NN during DT question - and - answer period ... Asked whether he planned to start his own network , he VBD ‘ EX MD be a JJ network ’ WDT will compete directly with Fox NNP . ‘ A bunch of NNS are looking to compete with Fox because EX ’s a perception ’ of decline , he VBD . … “ But I am starting my own operation . PRP are VBG to do DT … where PRP will VB into a studio and here PRP will look IN ‘ DT Factor . ’ . . . PRP ’s basically an experiment to see how JJ NNS are VBG to VB this service . DT ’s coming and will be here before September in a robust form . But I suspect EX will be another network maybe merging with PRP . EX will be a network WDT rises up because DT numbers for Fox are VBG down . ” DONALD NNP AND RUPERT MURDOCH , A HISTORY - From DT Guardian over DT weekend : “ DT alliance between Donald NNP and Rupert Murdoch has never been stronger . … Now , with a reported criminal investigation in connection with sexual harassment allegations into Fox NNP , DT stakes are higher than ever for DT two friends . … As NNP ’s ‘ inevitability ’ grew and PRP became clear he was VBG to win DT Republican nomination , DT two men grew closer still , uniting around what is perhaps DT biggest thing PRP have in common : both men love to win , and suddenly PRP were in a position to use CD another to do just DT . ” Sid Blumenthal : “ His entire empire ’s at stake – DT ’s why Murdoch is talking to him every day . PRP ’s not because he enjoys DT sparkling conversation of Donald NNP . ” More : “ ” -- “ Before DT Gunfire in Virginia , a Volatile Home Life in Illinois ” [ ] -- David Remnick : “ Who in DT White House Will Turn Against Donald NNP ” [ ] ERIC BOLLING FOR SENATE ? : “ Fox NNP anchor Eric Bolling MD have just signed a JJ multi- NN contract , but he ’s RB eyeing a possible career NN : A future run for Senate . For now , Bolling is secure in his job as co-host of DT JJ show ‘ DT Fox NNP Specialists . ’ But In a recent telephone interview from Fox NNP headquarters in NNP York City , Bolling VBD IN ‘ when DT lights VBP down on DT TV career ’ he wants to make a primary challenge against a sitting Republican senator in DT South . ‘ A lot of Republicans run as conservatives only to be elected , and PRP find out PRP ’re not conservative at all . ’ … Bolling … declined to specify which NN in DT South he ’d run , which senator he MD challenge or even when PRP MD happen . ” BIG UNIVISION FEATURE FROM JIM RUTENBERG - : “ By now PRP ’ve probably heard IN this is a golden age for journalism -- how DT NNP York Times and DT Washington Post are warring for scoops in ways reminiscent of DT Watergate era ; how an information - hungry NN is sending subscriptions and television NN ratings soaring , reinvigorating journalists and reaffirming their mission … But DT story is n’t complete if PRP does n’t include Univision NNP , CD of DT most striking examples I ’ve seen all NN of a NN organization WDT is meeting DT moment . PRP is DT leading NN source for Hispanics in DT NNP NNPS , citizen and noncitizen alike -- a core audience WDT has an almost existential stake in DT NNP administration ’s policies . ” More : “ ” REVOLVING DOOR : : “ Emma Carmichael , DT editor in chief of Jezebel , announced on Friday IN she 's stepping down from DT position next month . ‘ This has been DT hardest decision of my professional life , but PRP ’s CD I feel clear - headed about — I ’m simply a little burnt out and ready to take a break from running a website , ’ she wrote in a memo to her staff . … Carmichael becomes DT third woman in a leadership position to leave Gizmodo NNP Group in as JJ months . … But DT company has RB made increasing gender diversity a priority . ” -- Margaret Sullivan : “ When student journalists need defending , these lawyers swoop in . text: Steve Huffman , DT chief executive of Reddit , knows he has some explaining to do . Huffman , RB a Reddit co-founder , landed in hot NN Wednesday after admitting IN he used his administrative powers to secretly edit user comments WDT were critical of him on r/ Donald - a popular , pro-Trump forum ( or " subreddit " ) . He swapped all mentions of his own username with DT names of DT pro-Trump group 's leaders , meaning IN expletive - laden posts aimed at him looked instead as if PRP were insulting DT group 's leaders . PRP was not a good idea , he told DT Post Friday by phone . " I abused my power to give DT bullies a hard NN , " he VBD . Huffman thought of his name - swapping as a joke : a way to poke back at DT NNS who 've been harassing him and some of DT site 's volunteer moderators for months . PRP was not taken DT way . Huffman 's admission fanned DT flames of controversy WDT had been surrounding DT subreddit - and its relationship with Reddit - for months . PRP RB capped off what had already been a long week . Reddit was already warring with self - proclaimed NNP supporters after shutting down a subreddit devoted to " pizzagate " -- DT claim IN EX is secret child sex - trafficking ring run by prominent Democrats . DT NNP York Times and others have debunked this theory . DT company deleted DT group for revealing NNS 's personal information . DT subreddit and its users are known for promoting NN theories and fake NN across Reddit , and gleefully invading and bombarding DT rest of DT platform with pro-Trump memes . In fact , PRP was so effective at flooding DT site 's front page with aggressive memes and posts WDT Reddit changed its algorithm over DT summer to try to limit its reach . Nearly all of DT abuse directed at Huffman , he VBD , came from avid posters to r/The . After Huffman 's admission , JJ in DT pro-Trump group demanded his resignation ; he has not addressed those calls . Huffman told DT Post IN he had been letting DT abuse from DT subreddit 's users roll off him , but then wondered if turning DT other cheek was setting a bad example . " If Donald had done this to another Reddit employee , I MD have banned them , " he VBD . He VBD he intended to swap DT names for just a few hours - despite DT fact IN doing so violates Reddit employee policies - just to give DT subreddit 's moderators a taste of what he goes through on a daily basis . Then , he VBD , he intended to put everything back . Still , DT decision to step in and directly edit user comments was a surprising move from Huffman , who has often VBN Reddit 's purpose is to provide a place for communities of all stripes to set up their own groups . Reddit has struggled to address communities who regularly test DT boundaries of its guidelines , or outright break them . In 2015 , PRP introduced JJ anti-harassment rules and banned a handful of subreddits WDT regularly violated DT site 's guidelines - including two forums dedicated to " fat - shaming , " and CD WDT existed to coordinate harassment of members of a progressive gaming site . DT bans sparked an all - out war between DT company and DT small but dedicated extreme subreddits - some of which had used Reddit to circulate stolen photos , among other things . Reddit 's former interim CEO , Ellen Pao , resigned in DT middle of DT war last NN ; Huffman succeeded her . And since he took over , Huffman has maintained IN Reddit will not interfere with users ' posts , as long as PRP stayed within DT basic guidelines . To take a step across DT line , especially for a joke , is a major departure from DT philosophy . " What he did completely destroys DT credibility of Reddit , " wrote UnimatrixZeroOne , a Reddit moderator who " out of anger " released screen shots of Slack conversations Thursday between Reddit moderators , admins and Huffman about DT altered posts . Huffman confirmed on Friday IN DT images were authentic . In those conversations , some of DT site 's other moderators expressed frustration with DT pro-Trump subreddit and asked Huffman to ban PRP for repeatedly violating guidelines . CD wrote IN DT group 's members had released personally identifying information about others during DT election season . DT person RB mentioned receiving specific threats : " Car vandalism , pipe bomb threat ( specific ) . Rallying calls to ruin my personal life , " DT moderator wrote . Huffman 's distaste for DT group is clear , but DT chats showed he does not agree with banning PRP outright . " PRP make PRP seem IN I do n't care about figuring out t , " Huffman wrote later in DT chat , VBG on to say IN " banning PRP , " as JJ of DT moderators had asked , " MD create a mess . " ( DT moderators regularly abbreviate " Donald " to " t " or " td . " ) " PRP managed to pull a move WDT actually unified PRP with them against this mistake , " CD moderator replied . Even Reddit users WDT do n't support NNP have criticized Huffman . " I ca n't stand DT thought of NNP entering DT White House , but I have to stand up to this , " VBD CD commenter on DT site . " PRP 's wrong and totally unprofessional . PRP 's VBG to zap any trust NNS have with DT organization . " Huffman VBD he knows what he did MD set a bad precedent WDT MD hurt users ' trust in DT site . But he RB VBD , having seen this torrent of abuse first hand , IN he will have Reddit step up its efforts to let users filter out negative content , and to take on DT general problem of harassment . He did n't offer a timeline for those steps . But , he promised , PRP will have more finesse than his ill - received attempt at a joke . " I had my fun with them , PRP had their fun with me , " he VBD . " But PRP are not VBG to tolerate harassment for any others . "

text: Weight Watchers has announced IN music producer and inspirational social NN poster DJ Khaled will be its “ social NN ambassador ” for 2018 . While he MD not be giving away cars to a live studio audience or have a much - shopped list of his favorite things IN his fellow endorser Oprah Winfrey , DT lion - obsessed hitmaker and Justin Bieber and Chance DT Rapper collaborator is a natural choice for DT position , as he has 3.92 million Twitter followers , boasts 8.9 million Instagram followers , and receives 3 to 4 million views per snap on his entertaining and motivating Snapchat stories . DT music producer is currently on DT WW Freestyle program , a Weight Watchers initiative WDT launched last month featuring more “ free or zero - point ” foods and JJ “ rollover points . ” Khaled shared DT exciting NN with his mega - following in a series of Instagrams and Snapchats featuring DT meals he claims to be enjoying on DT WW Freestyle program . “ In full 2018 mode ... excited to be living this # WWFreestyle life with PRP , ” he captioned DT first in DT series of videos on Instagram . “ I already Got rid of 20 pounds and ready for more . Ride with me on my journey to greatness . Bless up Weight Watchers !!! # 2018secured what I love about this PRP ’s a life style and I still can enjoy at DT same NN ride wit me though this journey ! I CAN SHOW PRP BETTER THAN I CAN TELL PRP ... I ’m so focused let ’s VB ! ! ” DT videos RB feature Khaled ’s adorable son Asahd , to whom he credits DT motivation for a lifestyle NN in 2018 . “ Weight Watchers is all about being great and being your best self . My son is my love , my life , and I need to be great for him , ” he VBD . Winfrey , who has been DT celebrity face of DT brand for NNS now , welcomed DJ Khaled to DT Weight Watchers ’ family via Twitter with a sweet vote of confidence . “ @djkhaled Welcome to #WWFreestyle . Ca n’t wait to see PRP #blessup this program , ” she wrote . text: EX is a shared concern for these monographs . Both books are concerned with how DT nature of groups , taken together with our evolved psychology , can explain informational dynamics . Their central explanatory targets are DT spread and persistence of falsities , DT success or failure of charismatic demagogues , and DT baffling attractiveness of turgid academic prose . Yet DT JJ examples WDT Acerbi and Mercier focus on — do I share this post ? Spread DT rumor ? Believe those doomsayers ?— tend to have low costs and consequences . DT category of reflective beliefs , in fact , can be read as a mechanism for explaining why beliefs with seemingly high costs ( being a ‘ 911 truther ’ , say ) nonetheless do not have DT costs PRP are purported to have ( IN refusing all engagement with a presumed to be corrupt NN ) . Reflective beliefs just are n’t acted upon . EX is CD possible exception . Mercier discusses a kind of action he calls ‘ bridge - burning ’ . These involve making statements WDT are unacceptable and offensive to a group . PRP might VB then , IN these are high - cost actions . And in CD sense PRP are : PRP reduce or eliminate opportunities for collaboration , communication , and exchange with DT aggrieved party . But in another sense PRP are not . These ‘ bridge - burning ’ exercises are , on Mercier ’s framework , a means of ingratiating oneself to a different , friendlier group — PRP increase PRP ’s credibility with this JJ group precisely because PRP has nowhere else to turn . And this is why Mercier thinks PRP have mechanisms for assessing DT receptivity of our claims : PRP need to VB whether PRP ’ll find a welcome party when all routes out are ashes . ‘ Bridge - burning ’ can be a high - risk strategy . But EX are plenty of situations WDT are high - risk , high - cost , and made under conditions of uncertainty — do I invest in this method or DT CD ? Do I signal my affiliation to those guys or these ones ? When do I join in ? Such high - stakes social and JJ situations occur in JJ situations where informational dynamics , judgement aggregation , and group dynamics come together in highly context - sensitive ways . Acerbi ’s book is sensitive to these issues , and introduces some tools for measuring DT organization of social networks , DT strength of connections , and DT availability of information . For instance , Acerbi notes IN JJ social NN platforms tend to have networks with a ‘ hub - JJ ’ or ‘ star - JJ ’ network structure , where multiple individuals link to a central node . Take Donald NNP ’s twitter account , which has over seventy million followers yet only follows forty - some other accounts . His twitter network is very ‘ star - JJ ’ , with accounts connecting to his UH so JJ points radiating out of a central star . Interestingly , however , informational dynamics on these star - JJ networks can create illusions , giving “ DT misleading impression of polarization on Twitter , while , in fact , DT great majority of accounts [ are ] not or [ are ] scarcely polarized . ” ( CEDA 110 ) This is what Lerman et al. ( 2016 ) have called a ‘ majority illusion ’ ; IN despite being a minority , a population can appear to be in DT majority because of DT structural features of social networks . Footnote 7 PRP matters if PRP perceives PRP ’s self to be in DT minority . Centola et al. ( 2005 ) , for instance , have argued IN such a perception can drive DT expansion of otherwise unpopular norms . Networks WDT facilitate ‘ majority illusions ’ might thus exacerbate such spreading . Likewise , NNP ’s informational reach matters . Maybe multiple agents VBP together to discuss DT American Revolutionary War . PRP might talk about how revolutionary soldiers ‘ took over DT British airports ’ , recalling IN PRP heard this information from somewhere . Given IN multiple independent agents recall DT information , this might lend additional credence to DT claims . But DT seeming independence is false and driven by network effects : all had heard PRP from a common source , NNP ’s Fourth of July “ Salute to America . ” Footnote 8 Lest this seem IN a facile example , Mercier deploys something IN this mechanism to explain DT start of DT Iraq War and DT spread of religions ( NBY , 172–176 ) . Yet while issues around network topology creep in here - and - RB in Acerbi and Mercier ’s books , neither gives what I VBP to be sufficient attention . EX is now a large and powerful body of work on DT effects of social network topologies on information dynamics coming out of social epistemology , economics , and other literatures . DT analytic and agent - based models of these literatures show how network organization interacting with information aggregation procedures can generate surprising individual - and group - level effects . I VBP EX are plenty of reasons why both Acerbi and Mercier should VB to pay more attention this expansive literature . DT first is IN PRP provides a suite of tools , metrics , and explanatory models for understanding DT trade - offs and consequences of different network topologies , information aggregation strategies , and group compositions . These directly address DT social phenomena WDT Acerbi and Mercier target , offering a distinct perspective on DT information dynamics of innovation diffusion ( e.g. Kiesling et al. 2012 ) , testimonial norms ( e.g. Mayo - Wilson 2014 ) , and conformity effects ( e.g. Mohseni and Williams 2019 ) . DT second reason concerns DT role of background information and context in both Acerbi and Mercier ’s books . Incoming information is tested against background information for plausibility , and shapes DT trajectories of cultural NN . But this suggests IN information dynamics will be highly sensitive to DT order in which information is received — our priors can be biased and our evaluation non-commutative . This matters substantially for information dynamics , offering routes for systematic group - level disagreement ( Zollman 2010 ) , polarization ( Goldberg and Stein 2018 ) , and deviation from optimal or more veridical outcomes ( Holman and Bruner 2017 ) . And third , social network models provide contrasts to DT assumptions at work in Acerbi and Mercier . Both suggest , in more or less DT same form , IN DT “ spread of most misconceptions is explained by their intuitively appealing content , rather than by DT skills of those who propound them . ” ( NBY 260 ) This is a bold claim , especially given IN modelling results from social networks suggest IN under quite minimal assumptions , wholly rational agents can end up pursuing and perpetuating false beliefs ( O’Connor and Weatherall 2019 ) . These effects can be exacerbated by malicious actors ( ibid. ) , but can RB be produced where informational uncertainty combines with specific network topologies ( O’Connor and Weatherall 2020 ) . This is what I meant when I VBD above IN DT gullibility account is a useful foil , but IN ultimately Mercier is punching - down . Mercier associates DT gullibility account with a deferential attitude towards authority and an unquestioning acceptance of all information ; IN human beings are mindless sheeple subject to herd behavior . But DT picture endorsed by Mercier and Acerbi — with rational agents operating under uncertainty — can still generate herd - JJ behavior ( Banerjee 1992 ; Hung and Plott 2001 ) , conformity and free - riding ( List and Pettit 2004 ) , and DT persistence of misinformed groups ( Golub and Jackson 2010 ) under a wide range of plausible conditions . So I VBP EX are good reasons why Acerbi and Mercier should engage with these nearby literatures . But EX is no reason why DT engagement should be a CD - way street . JJ of DT models employed in social epistemology and economics employ sparse characterizations of human agents and their psychology . Mercier and Acerbi ’s work , by contrast , draws on experimental results from psychology , paleoanthropological evidence , and evolutionary reasoning to back substantive claims about human cognition . Feeding these psychological and evolutionary assumptions into network models might offer a means of exploring their claims about human cognitive evolution , cultural NN , and DT spread of misinformation . At DT same NN , such an exchange might generate useful helpful friction . Current network models often share a basic assumption with Acerbi and Mercier — notably , some form of rationality . PRP might VB , then , IN these models are grist to DT authors ’ evolutionary mills . But PRP might not . For JJ network models are minimal models ( Weisberg 2013 ) , WDT show how significant group level effects can be driven by few psychological assumptions . These suggest IN while DT mechanisms endorsed in Acerbi and Mercier ’s books MD be sufficient to generate DT relevant phenomena , PRP are not necessary . EX are other empirically - supported characterizations of how human beings acquire , interpret , and transmit information . How these two characterizations should be reconciled is an open question . But looking at DT rich theoretical and modelling literature in economics , social epistemology and sociology provides not only a strong juxtaposition to DT two accounts on offer , but RB a rich set of tools for exploring their hypotheses and claims . However this interaction plays out , PRP is worth closing on a positive note . Both Mercier and Acerbi ’s volumes are enjoyable , story - driven journeys . PRP guide DT reader through large and expanding literatures in an entertaining and illuminating way . PRP are upbeat about human capabilities and provide a useful optimistic counterpoint to DT recent spate of epistemological doomsayers .

text: Vice NNP - elect Mike Pence received a surprise dinner invitation on Monday night from his JJ neighbors in leafy northwest Washington . PRP asked him to dine with them at Comet Ping Pong , DT pizzeria at DT center of debate over whether allies of NNP - elect Donald J. NNP are spreading so - called fake NN . In an open letter posted on DT online blogging platform Medium , Mr. Pence ’s neighbors — part of a coalition WDT describes itself as opposed to DT “ unacceptable practices and policies in DT NNP administration ” — implored DT vice NN - elect to “ help bring an end to this madness through DT simple act of breaking bread . ” EX was no immediate comment from Mr. Pence or a spokesman . During DT transition period , Mr. Pence and his family have rented a temporary home in a heavily Democratic area not far from Comet Ping Pong , a popular dining spot for families with NNS . DT restaurant became caught up in a bizarre NN theory after fake NN reports claimed DT pizzeria was operating a child sex slave ring linked to Hillary NNP . Earlier this month , DT fake story led to DT firing of real bullets , when a gunman showed up at Comet Ping Pong , saying he had come to “ self - investigate ” DT claims , and fired shots inside , terrifying DT entire neighborhood . No NN was injured , and DT police arrested Edgar M. Welch of Salisbury , N.C. , who remains in jail . DT episode drew JJ attention to DT Twitter habits of Lt. Gen. Michael T. Flynn , Mr. NNP ’s pick for national security adviser , who has used social NN to spread fake NN stories .
